message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.SD (Sound): The paper deals with speech audio as input and focuses on generating facial animation from it. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper involves generating 3D facial animation, which falls under the domain of computer vision. 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper deals with speech audio and involves learning contextual information and affective states within the speech, which falls under the domain of natural language processing. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper involves training a deep neural network to map speech audio to facial animation, which falls under the domain of machine learning. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia): The paper involves generating multimedia content (3D facial animation) from speech audio, which falls under the domain of multimedia.
